Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Make Route53 DNS optional and improve Terraform usability

Enhanced Terraform configuration to support deployments without Route53:
- Made Route53 DNS optional via enable_route53 variable (defaults to false)
- App Runner services always get default URLs, Route53 adds custom domains
- Added terraform.tfvars.example template with comprehensive documentation
- Improved tag consistency (Requestor instead of deployed_by)
- Updated README with clearer prerequisites and AWS SSO guidance

Changes:
- variables.tf: Added enable_route53 flag, made domain_name/route53_zone_id optional
- route53.tf: Conditionally create DNS records only if enable_route53 = true
- outputs.tf: Show App Runner URLs when Route53 disabled
- main.tf: Standardized tag names (Requestor, Account)
- README.md: Document optional Route53, terraform.tfvars.example workflow
- terraform.tfvars.example: Complete template with all variables documented

This enables quick demos without Route53 setup while preserving custom DNS capability.
